membership.title: Memberships
membership.faq_cancel_q: Can I cancel my membership anytime?
membership.faq_cancel_a: Yes, you can cancel your membership at any time. Your benefits will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
membership.faq_switch_a: Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.
membership.faq_refund_a: We offer a full refund within the first 14 days of your membership. After that, you can cancel but no refund will be issued for the remaining period.
